EmailTemplate.name: New Snapshot Deployment
EmailTemplate.subject: A Snapshot Deployment was executed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A new Snapshot Deployment was executed on {!snapshot_push__c.CreatedDate} by {!snapshot_push__c.OwnerFullName} and your Org was successfully updated.
For more details about the migration, please view the information below: {!snapshot_push__c.push_results__c}
Thanks,
Your friendly neighborhood Salesforce Administrator
